title: Nirvana Rebirth - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Mecha   Psychological   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai
tags: Androids   Artificial Intelligence   Cold Love Interests   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Dystopia   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Long Separations   Secrets   Selfless Protagonist   Time Skip   Time Travel   Wars   Weak Protagonist
author: Fei Tian Ye Xiang   非天夜翔
description: In the tides of time, humankind has lost their position as the wisest of all creatures. The Steel City that suddenly rose in the center of the eastern lands and a man-made god, ‘Father,’ have replaced them. Mechs have taken over the world of this petri dish, Astrolabe, that the ancient Creators have left behind. One day, a young human slave named A-Ka finds a black-haired male on a beach of Desolate Sea… The world of Astrolabe is about to reboot, so what will become of the future of the humans, androids, and mechs?>
